overview: Collection of three short films from Falcon Studios. "Johnny Harden" — The popular young sex stud with it all - face, body, endowment - gives a sizzling solo performance to heat up a hot tub. "Champs" — blond waterskier Sky Dawson beaches with his towing buddy Mike Flynn for a secluded island-top session of sensual outdoor action. Soon they're joined by curious boat-jockey Bruce McMaster for a three-way workout that erupts their mid-lake hideaway with steaming passion. "Dunes" — Wrangler Clint Ely and drifter Hal Drake meet up for outdoor sex in the dunes.
title: Johnny Harden & The Champs
